trans-unit.source: Represents a state in a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity" />.
The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> represents a State in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.

State activities could contain one or more <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, or <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> classes, one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> class, and one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: 상태 활동에는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> 또는 한 개 이상의 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 클래스, 한 개의 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 클래스 및 한 개의 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity> 클래스가 포함될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: SetState activities are used inside an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> to move the state of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: SetState 활동은 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> 및 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 내에서 사용되어 워크플로의 상태를 이동시킵니다.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> is executing, the only events that can be received are the events that can be handled by the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> and also the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities attached to the enclosing <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activities and the root <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>를 실행하는 동안 받을 수 있는 이벤트는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> 내에 있는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 활동과 바깥쪽 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> 활동에 연결된 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 활동과 루트 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>에 연결된 활동에서 처리할 수 있는 이벤트뿐입니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> starts running, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> will check to see whether a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity is present or not.
The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> can have zero or one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>에는 0개 또는 한 개의 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 활동이 포함될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity is present the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> will be executed.

As soon as the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity finishes, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> blocks events so that the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> only receives events that can be handled by its <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> 활동이 완료되면 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>가 이벤트를 차단하여 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>가 자기 자신의 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> 활동에서 처리할 수 있는 이벤트만을 받도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, meaning the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>입니다. 즉, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 활동에 다른 활동이 포함될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> class and use it implement a simple state machine to transition between 3 states.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 만들고 이 인스턴스로 단순한 상태 시스템을 구현하여 세 가지 상태를 전환하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 이 코드 예제는 StateMachineWorkflow.cs 파일에 있는 SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK 샘플의 일부입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Simple State Machine](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> class.
The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 만드는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK Sample from the StateMachineWorkflow.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 이 코드 예제는 StateMachineWorkflow.cs 파일에 있는 SimpleStateMachineWorkflow SDK 샘플의 일부입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Simple State Machine](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1974edbd-253d-4e01-9095-38ff9c3e749e).
The user-defined name of the activity.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 활동 이름을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The execution context for the activity.
Cancels the execution of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.
The current status of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> in the running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 실행 중인 워크플로 인스턴스에 있는 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />의 현재 상태입니다.

trans-unit.source: The execution context for the activity.
Executes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.
The current status of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> in the running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: 실행 중인 워크플로 인스턴스에 있는 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />의 현재 상태입니다.

trans-unit.source: The child activity.
Gets the executing instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> that corresponds to the specified child activity name.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 자식 활동 이름에 해당하는 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />의 실행 인스턴스를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The dynamic child activities.
The executable activities do not contain the <paramref name="childActivityName" />.
trans-unit.target: 실행 가능한 활동에 <paramref name="childActivityName" />가 포함되지 않은 경우

trans-unit.source: The service provider from which to obtain services.
Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" /> using the service provider.
The execution context for the activity.
The activity added to the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity" />.
Determines if the activity being added is an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" /> and if so, verifies whether the newly added event driven needs to be subscribed.
trans-unit.target: 추가 중인 활동이 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity" />인지 확인하고, 그럴 경우에는 새로 추가된 이벤트 구동 활동을 구독해야 하는지 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: This is method is called whenever a user adds a child to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> through workflow changes.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 사용자가 워크플로 변경을 통해 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>에 자식을 추가할 때마다 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Note that this method is defined in CompositeActivity and overridden by the StateActivity, where it checks whether the activity being added is an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> and if so, verifies if the newly added event driven needs to be subscribed.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 CompositeActivity에 정의되어 있고 StateActivity에 의해 재정의됩니다. 여기서 이 메서드는 추가하는 활동이 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>인지 확인하고 그럴 경우에는 새로 추가된 이벤트 구동 활동을 구독해야 하는지 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: The service provider from which to obtain services.
Called by the workflow runtime engine as part of the activity's transition to the <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus.Closed" /> state.
trans-unit.target: 활동이 <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus.Closed" /> 상태로 전환되는 과정의 일부로 워크플로 런타임 엔진에서 호출됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Holds the string value of the change tracking data key; "StateActivity.StateChange".
trans-unit.target: 변경 내용 추적 데이터 키 "StateActivity.StateChange"의 문자열 값을 보유합니다.

trans-unit.source: This field is a constant.
